name: Tomb of the Golden Boot
description:
You are Malcolm Sterling, adventurer and artifact hunter. After gathering some clues, you have discovered the Tomb of the Golden Boot. After rappelling down a rope, you find yourself in a room lit by torches. Who knows what is lurking down there...

Explore 3 different tombs!

Avoid patrolling enemies!

Solve puzzles to find the treasure!

**FOR THE MOUSE CURSOR TO DISAPPEAR WHILE PLAYING, CLICK ON THE SIDES OF THE SCREEN AND THEN THE GAME WINDOW**
